answers.answer: Yes its normal because u r so small & short & thats only 7 lbs. You are fine honey
Tell those people they are welcome to pay your expenses if they want a say in it. You are tiny! Of course your belly is going to look huge with an extra seven lbs tacked onto it!
It's completely normal , you probably think that your belly looks a little big but it's really not it's just because you have a small frame.

question: I'm a tiny girl, about 4"10 and began pregnancy at 104lbs. I am now 4 months pregnant and at 111 lbs, it doesn't seem like much weight gain but my stomach is REALLY big for 4 months. Everyone's telling me to get checked for gestational diabetes or "slow down eating" when I really don't even eat that much. Is this normal because of my size ?
title: showing
